document.discussion_title: Usain Bolt threw a javelin at the Olympics like no big deal
document.topic_text: Is there anything this man can't do? The fastest athlete in the world, Usain Bolt dominated at the Rio Olympics by taking home three gold medals. But it appears he wasn't done showing us his athletic ability. SEE ALSO: Usain Bolt gives the world the best Usain Bolt photo ever Following his press conference on Saturday ... »
document.post: Is there anything this man can't do? The fastest athlete in the world, Usain Bolt dominated at the Rio Olympics by taking home three gold medals.
